builtin_funcs.input: takes input from the standard input
builtin_funcs.range: Returns a list of integers from start to end, with step
builtin_funcs.find: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the string
builtin_funcs.count: Returns the number of non-overlapping occurrences of the string
builtin_funcs.findall: Returns a list of all occurrences of the string
builtin_funcs.len: returns the length of a list or a string
builtin_funcs.exit: exits the program with the exit code
